Excluded.label: Excluded commands/words
Excluded.tooltip:
The commands/words the bot will not answer too seperated by space. To avoid the bot spamming people if they use commands that's set to be used in whispers. 

Example:
!slots !gamble !spin

Message.value: The only messages I can respond to is: {0}
Message.label: Message
Message.tooltip: Message the bot will use when someone whisper the bot something that isn't in the excluded list.

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!
